mapper.sql: a.acticle_id AS "acticleid", a.id AS "id", a.att_file_time AS "attfiletime", a.att_file_name AS "attfilename", a.att_file_size AS "attfilesize", a.att_file_type AS "attfiletype", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_article_att_file( id, acticle_id, att_file_time, att_file_name, att_file_size, att_file_type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, att_file_key, del_flag, attfile_temp_guid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{acticleid}, #{attfiletime}, #{attfilename}, #{attfilesize}, #{attfiletype}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{attfilekey}, #{delFlag}, #{attfile_temp_guid} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.acticle_id AS "acticleid", a.id AS "id", a.att_file_time AS "attfiletime", a.att_file_name AS "attfilename", a.att_file_size AS "attfilesize", a.att_file_type AS "attfiletype", a.att_file_key AS "attfilekey", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM cms_article_att_file a WHERE a.acticle_id = #{acticleid} AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ispostarticle = '1'

SELECT a.acticle_id AS "acticleid", a.id AS "id", a.att_file_time AS "attfiletime", a.att_file_name AS "attfilename", a.att_file_size AS "attfilesize", a.att_file_type AS "attfiletype", a.att_file_key AS "attfilekey", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM cms_article_att_file a WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ispostarticle = '1'

SELECT a.acticle_id AS "acticleid", a.id AS "id", a.att_file_time AS "attfiletime", a.att_file_name AS "attfilename", a.att_file_size AS "attfilesize", a.att_file_type AS "attfiletype", a.att_file_key AS "attfilekey", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM cms_article_att_file a WHERE a.att_file_key = #{attfilekey} AND a.del_flag = '0' AND a.ispostarticle = '1'
SELECT a.ispostarticle FROM cms_article_att_file a WHERE a.attfile_temp_guid=#{temp_guid}
